full_summary:
# Engine Lathe (W0046-240076B) - Request for Proposal

## Solicitation Details

*   **Title**: Engine Lathe (W0046-240076B)
*   **Document Reference**: WS4345224406-Doc4568704525
*   **Amendment Number**: 5
*   **Solicitation Number**: WS4345224406
*   **Publication Date**: May 3, 2024
*   **Tender Closing Date**: May 21, 2024, 2:00 PM EDT
*   **Latest Amendment Date**: May 16, 2024

## Procurement Summary

This Request for Proposal (RFP) is issued by the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of the Department of National Defence (DND) to acquire one Engine Lathe for the Royal Military College of Canada (RMCC), Department of Civil Engineering.

## Tender Information

*   **Document ID**: WS4345224406-Doc4568704525
*   **Solicitation Number**: WS4345224406
*   **RFP Title**: Engine Lathe (W0046-240076B)

## Contract Details

*   **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services
*   **End-User Entity**: Department of National Defence
*   **Contract Start Date**: June 3, 2024
*   **Contract End Date**: May 31, 2024

## Outcome

This Request for Proposal has expired. The tender closing date was May 21, 2024, and it was announced that all bids submitted after 2:00 PM EDT will be considered non-responsive.

**Expression of Interests and Submissions shall be directed to:**

Cheng, Sabrina (SPAC/PSPC)
[sabrina.cheng@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:sabrina.cheng@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

# Notice of Posting

The Request for Proposal was posted on Ariba Discovery on May 3, 2024. To view the RFP, please visit the following URL:

[https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19591188?extsite=MTk1OTExODhfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19591188?extsite=MTk1
